title: Workshop on Designing Digital Game-Based Social Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Social studies education methodologies, basic proficiency with digital tools, and game-based learning theory
context.additional_context: Participatory project where pre-service teachers design elementary social studies curricula using multi-user digital game-based environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply digital game mechanics (quests, feedback systems) to social studies problem-solving activities
Learners can implement a collaboration-based curriculum design process in VR/simulation environments with over 80% completion fidelity
Learners can develop at least three strategies to promote social interaction among elementary learners using multi-user game interfaces
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
